For service from these stations, take the [1] to 168 St* and transfer to a South Ferry-bound [1].

text:
Planned Work
STRUCTURAL IMPROVEMENTS
[G] No trains between Hoyt-Schermerhorn and Church Av
Service operates in two sections

[A] [F] trains provide alternate service
Weekends, 11:30 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Nov 24 - 27 • Dec 1 - 4

No [G] service at Bergen, Carroll, Smith-9 Sts, 4 Av-9 St, 7 Av, 15 St-Prospect Park,
Fort Hamilton Pkwy and Church Av. Take the [F] instead.

• Transfer between [A] and [G] trains at Hoyt-Schermerhorn.
• Transfer between [A] and [F] trains at Jay St-MetroTech.

[G] service operates in two sections:
 1. Between Court Sq and Bedford-Nostrand Avs
 2. Between Bedford-Nostrand Avs and Hoyt-Schermerhorn, every 20 minutes.

• Transfer at Bedford-Nostrand Avs to continue your trip.

name: NQR
text:
Service Change  Posted: 11/26/2017 10:05AM

There is [R] train shuttle service between 36 St-(Bklyn) and Bay Ridge-95 St in both directions.

Southbound [R] trains are stopping along the [D] line from 36 St (Bklyn) to 9 Av then end.

Northbound [N] trains are stopping along the [R] line from DeKalb Av to Canal St.

These service changes are because of debris on the tracks at 86 St.

Our Crews are on site trying to fix it ASAP and we'll follow up soon. Stay tuned for updates.



Planned Work

Take the [D] for 62 St/New Utrecht Av.
